title: RBI expresses concern over credit growth, says expansion of above 18% may create risk
description: Retail lending growth slows in Q4 FY24, while bank lending to NBFCs moderates. The share of bank lending to NBFCs decreases, indicating a shift towards balanced credit practices for financial stability.
